original_text: But what I now say to you is this: Anybody who is angry with his brother will have to stand in front of a judge. Or someone might call his brother by a bad name. Then he will have to stand in front of the Jewish leaders. They will judge him. But someone may say to his brother, “You are a fool.” God will judge that person. God may punish him in the fires of hell.
korean_text: 나는 너희에게 이르노니 형제에게 노하는 자마다 심판을 받게 되고 형제를 대하여 라가라 하는 자는 공회에 잡혀가게 되고 미련한 놈이라 하는 자는 지옥 불에 들어가게 되리라

sentences.original_text: But what I now say to you is this:
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 지금 너희에게 말하는 것은 이것이다:

sentences.original_text: Anybody who is angry with his brother
will have to stand in front of a judge.
Or someone might call his brother by a bad name.
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 누군가 자기 형제를 나쁜 이름으로 부를 수도 있다.

sentences.original_text: Then he will have to stand in front of the Jewish leaders.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그는 유대 지도자들 앞에 서야 할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: But someone may say to his brother,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 누군가 자기 형제에게 말할 수도 있다,

sentences.original_text: God may punish him in the fires of hell.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그를 지옥의 불로 벌하실 수도 있다.
